org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding.BindingInfo

    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding.i18n  

    • Uses of BindingInfo in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding

      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding that return BindingInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @Nullable BindingInfo BindingInfoRegistry.getBindingInfo(@Nullable String id)
      Returns the binding information for the specified binding ID, or null if no binding information could be found.
      @Nullable BindingInfo BindingInfoRegistry.getBindingInfo(@Nullable String id, @Nullable Locale locale)
      Returns the binding information for the specified binding ID and locale (language), or null if no binding information could be found.
      @Nullable BindingInfo BindingInfoProvider.getBindingInfo(@Nullable String id, @Nullable Locale locale)
      Returns the binding information for the specified binding ID and locale (language), or null if no binding information could be found.
      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.binding that return types with arguments of type BindingInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<BindingInfo> BindingInfoRegistry.getBindingInfos()
      Returns all binding information this registry contains.
      Set<BindingInfo> BindingInfoRegistry.getBindingInfos(@Nullable Locale locale)
      Returns all binding information in the specified locale (language) this registry contains.
      Set<BindingInfo> BindingInfoProvider.getBindingInfos(@Nullable Locale locale)
      Returns all binding information in the specified locale (language) this provider contains.
